subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Harvard, a 12th seed, beat fifth-seeded Cincinnati on Thursday afternoon, a year after beating third-seeded New Mexico in its opening N.C.A.A. tournament game.
snippet: Harvard, a 12th seed, beat fifth-seeded Cincinnati on Thursday afternoon, a year after beating third-seeded New Mexico in its opening N.C.A.A. tournament game.
